scripts.dev: NODE_OPTIONS='--max-http-header-size=24576' next dev -p 3000 & nodemon --watch ../src/ZKare.sol --exec ' yarn deploy-zkare && sleep 3 && ./script/log.sh'
scripts.deploy-zkare: forge script DeployZKare --rpc-url http://localhost:8545 -vv --mnemonics 'test test test test test test test test test test test junk' --sender '0xf39Fd6e51aad88F6F4ce6aB8827279cffFb92266' --broadcast &&  ./script/generate-abi-from-front.sh
